scripts.rebuild-electron: node -e "if(!process.env.ELECTRON_VERSION){console.error('Set ELECTRON_VERSION env var');process.exit(1);}" && npx electron-rebuild -f -w serialport -v $ELECTRON_VERSION || true
scripts.package: cd vscode-extension && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd .. && npm run rebuild-native && cd vscode-extension && npx vsce package --no-dependencies && echo 'VS Code extension packaged successfully in vscode-extension/'
